title: RDP session on wrong monitor's taskbar
author: procdaddy11
body_snippet:
RDP session opens fullscreen on external monitor which is great, but the session shows down in the primary monitor's taskbar instead of the external monitor's.

I made sure the taskbar setting for "Taskbar where window is open" is selected.

Direct RDP usage results in the right taskbar location being used.

Windows 10 x64
